headline: Albemarle Corporation (ALB): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Albemarle Corporation on The Musings of Ozz’s Substack by Christopher De Ozz. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on ALB. Albemarle Corporation’s share was trading at $74.77 as of July 28th. ALB’s trailing and forward P/E were 35.46 and 18.45, respectively according to Yahoo Finance. Albemarle Corporation […]
